bwg.standard_tasks¶

Module contents¶

Defining standard tasks for the NLP pipeline.

class bwg.standard_tasks.DependencyParseTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin

Luigi task that dependency-parses sentences in a corpus.

class bwg.standard_tasks.NERTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin

Luigi task that performs Named Entity Recognition on a corpus.

class bwg.standard_tasks.NaiveOpenRelationExtractionTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin

Luigi task that performs Open Relation extraction on a corpus.

extract_relations(ne_tagged_line, dependency_tree, pos_tagged_line)¶

Extract relations involving Named Entities from a sentence, using a dependency graph and named entity tags.

Parameters:
  • ne_tagged_line (list) – Current NE tagged sentence.
  • dependency_tree (dict) – Dependency parse tree.
  • pos_tagged_line (list) – Same sentence as dependency parse tree but with PoS tags.
Returns:

List of extracted relations.
Return type:

list
class bwg.standard_tasks.ParticipationExtractionTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin

Luigi task that extracts all Named Entity participating in an issue or topic.

class bwg.standard_tasks.PoSTaggingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task, bwg.mixins.ArticleProcessingMixin

Luigi task that PoS tags a sentence in a corpus.

class bwg.standard_tasks.SimpleReadingTask(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: luigi.task.Task

A luigi task that reads an extracted Wikipedia corpus (see README).
